remarks: Posethood is determined only by structure components and only by the value of the relation within the base set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pospropd.kv $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
pospropd.lv $e |- ( ph -> L e. W ) $.
pospropd.kb $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
pospropd.lb $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
pospropd.xy $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( le ` K ) y <-> x ( le ` L ) y ) ) $.
pospropd $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. Poset <-> L e. Poset ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
